## Administration ## ### Missing: admin.flashmessages=Flash Messages ### Missing: flash.creation.utcinfo=The time used for alerts is based on UTC. To check the UTC time you can use the button 'now' in the calendar ### Missing: flash.home.title=Flash entries ### Missing: flash.home.msginfo=See here the history of FLASH messages published on the knowledge base. ### Missing: flash.panels.quicklinktitle=Flash Messages
